thread.title: CounterTack | MCSI Announces Partnership with Core Cloud Technology Corporation
thread.title_full: CounterTack | MCSI Announces Partnership with Core Cloud Technology Corporation

title: CounterTack | MCSI Announces Partnership with Core Cloud Technology Corporation
text: Wednesday, July 22, 2015 11:00AM IST (5:30AM GMT) (BW)(MA-COUNTERTACK-MCSI) CounterTack | MCSI Announces Partnership with Core Cloud Technology Corporation CounterTack | MCSI teams up with integrated network information and professional services marketing company who will join CounterTack | MCSI’s CyberPath Partner Program Mass., Waltham, United States CounterTack | MCSI , the leader in Big Data Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR), today announced that Taiwanese technology leader Core Cloud Technology Corporation , will join CounterTack | MCSI’s CyberPath Partner program as a strategic technology reseller. Core Cloud Technology Corporation is a professional technology company with agents, research and development, integration and co-marketing for the core business of high-tech information technology services. Aiming to be the industry leader in integrated network information technology and professional services, Core Cloud developed its own professional R&D technical value-added network application technology and offers world-renowned network equipment products. “We are excited to add Core Cloud to our CyberPath Partner Program, and look forward to working with them to continue to expand our global footprint,” said Kirk Appelman, SVP, International Sales, CounterTack | MCSI. “As a company dedicated to truly serving our customer base, CounterTack | MCSI is looking forward to doing business in the APAC region with Core Cloud, who is an established leader delivering high technical value through its partners and customers.” CounterTack recently acquired ManTech Cyber Solutions International (MCSI), which delivers the only EDR capability now that combines real-time operating system-level behavioral threat detection with in-memory threat analysis, mapping to the entire cyber kill chain and scaling enterprise-wide. The combined CounterTack | MCSI organization’s now has 200+ customers across its installed base, with close to half a million endpoints sold to-date. Core Cloud’s networking equipment solutions offer the ability for companies to build long-term, stable relationships through sales and alliances such as this. CounterTack | MCSI will be able to optimize Core Cloud’s services to support this aggressive go-to-market campaign and ensure continued unprecedented value to their customers. CounterTack is debuting its full suite of EDR products at upcoming industry conferences worldwide, along with the ability to subscribe to Responder PRO on-site through the CounterTack | MCSI eShop: RSA Asia 2015: July 22 – 24, Booth S14, Level 5, Grand Ballroom, Marina Bay Sands Resort, Singapore. Black Hat USA 2015 : August 5 & 6, Booths 1147 and 447, Mandalay Bay Casino & Resort, Las Vegas, NV. About CounterTack | MCSI CounterTack | MCSI is the leading provider of real-time, Big Data endpoint detection and response technology for the enterprise. CounterTack | MCSI provides unprecedented visibility and context around operating system and in-memory behaviors to detect zero-days attacks, rootkits, targeted malware and advanced persistent threats, enabling our customers to improve incident response and advanced threat detection, enterprise-wide. Built on Big Data architecture to counter endpoint threats at-scale and leveraging tamper-resistant collection for pure behavioral capture on enterprise endpoints, (laptops, servers, workstations, mobile devices) CounterTack | MCSI dramatically reduces the impact of the most advanced attacks in real-time, giving teams an opportunity to defend the enterprise before incidents escalate. Our 200+ customers leverage next-generation solutions on a global scale, across verticals and within a strategic partner ecosystem that includes MSSP and professional services around incident response and threat remediation. To learn more, please visit: http://www.countertack.com . About Core Cloud Technology Corporation Core Cloud Technology Corporation is responsible for the development, integration and coordination of marketing activities for high-tech information technology services companies. The excellent introduction of products, applications development and customer service have provided Core Cloud Technology with many long-term partners. The company aims to become a leader in the integrated network information technology and professional services industry. Quality is their foundation as well as creating the best products and services while respecting their customers’ commitments. Please visit Core Cloud.com for more information on their entire suite of solutions. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150721006731/en/ For News Release background on CounterTack | MCSI click here CONTACTS : MSLGROUP Nina Gill, 781-684-0770 countertack@mslgroup.com or CounterTack | MCSI Tom Bain, 617-500-2780 tbain@countertack.com
